foundations.title: Einstein Field Equations
foundations.author: Albert Einstein
foundations.description: The fundamental equations of General Relativity that describe how matter and energy curve spacetime, and how curved spacetime tells matter how to move.

foundations.title: Metric Tensor
foundations.author: Bernhard Riemann
foundations.description: The fundamental mathematical object that encodes the geometry of spacetime, defining distances, angles, and the causal structure of the universe.

foundations.title: Ricci Tensor & Ricci Scalar
foundations.author: Gregorio Ricci-Curbastro, Tullio Levi-Civita
foundations.description: The fundamental measures of spacetime curvature that describe how matter and energy bend space.

foundations.title: Dirac Equation
foundations.author: Paul Dirac
foundations.description: The relativistic wave equation for spin-1/2 particles, unifying quantum mechanics and special relativity.

foundations.title: Dirac Spinors
foundations.author: Paul Dirac
foundations.description: The mathematical objects that describe fermions with spin-1/2 in relativistic quantum mechanics.

foundations.title: Clifford Algebra
foundations.author: William Kingdon Clifford
foundations.description: The mathematical framework that unifies real numbers, complex numbers, quaternions, and geometric algebra.

foundations.title: Einstein-Hilbert Action
foundations.author: David Hilbert
foundations.description: The action principle from which Einstein's field equations of General Relativity are derived.

foundations.title: Yang-Mills Theory
foundations.author: Chen-Ning Yang, Robert Mills
foundations.description: The foundation of modern particle physics: a non-abelian gauge theory that underlies the strong and electroweak forces.

foundations.title: Kaluza-Klein Theory
foundations.author: Theodor Kaluza, Oskar Klein
foundations.description: The groundbreaking theory showing how extra spatial dimensions can unify gravity and electromagnetism.

foundations.title: Boltzmann Entropy
foundations.author: Ludwig Boltzmann
foundations.description: The fundamental equation of statistical mechanics relating entropy to the number of microstates.

foundations.title: Hawking Temperature
foundations.author: Stephen Hawking
foundations.description: The temperature at which black holes emit thermal radiation, unifying quantum mechanics and general relativity.

foundations.title: Unruh Effect
foundations.author: William Unruh
foundations.description: Accelerated observers perceive the quantum vacuum as a thermal bath.

foundations.title: KMS Condition
foundations.author: Kubo, Martin, Schwinger
foundations.description: The mathematical condition characterizing thermal equilibrium in quantum systems.

foundations.title: Tomita-Takesaki Theory
foundations.author: Minoru Tomita, Masamichi Takesaki
foundations.description: The mathematical framework for modular theory in operator algebras.

foundations.title: SO(10) Grand Unified Theory
foundations.author: Howard Georgi
foundations.description: All Standard Model forces and one generation of matter fit into a single 16-dimensional spinor representation.

foundations.title: Calabi-Yau Manifolds
foundations.author: Eugenio Calabi, Shing-Tung Yau
foundations.description: Complex compact manifolds with vanishing Ricci curvature, fundamental to string theory compactifications.

foundations.title: G2 Manifolds
foundations.author: Élie Cartan
foundations.description: Exceptional 7-dimensional manifolds with G2 holonomy, preserving supersymmetry in M-theory compactifications.

foundations.title: PMNS Matrix
foundations.author: Pontecorvo, Maki, Nakagawa, Sakata
foundations.description: The neutrino mixing matrix relating flavor and mass eigenstates.

foundations.title: CKM Matrix
foundations.author: Cabibbo, Kobayashi, Maskawa
foundations.latex: V_{CKM} = \begin{pmatrix} V_{ud} & V_{us} & V_{ub} \\ V_{cd} & V_{cs} & V_{cb} \\ V_{td} & V_{ts} & V_{tb} \end{pmatrix}
foundations.description: The quark mixing matrix describing flavor-changing weak interactions.

foundations.title: Higgs Mechanism
foundations.author: Higgs, Englert, Brout
foundations.description: Spontaneous symmetry breaking giving mass to gauge bosons and fermions.

foundations.title: Friedmann Equations
foundations.author: Alexander Friedmann
foundations.description: Equations governing the expansion of the universe in homogeneous isotropic cosmology.

foundations.title: Renormalization Group
foundations.author: Stueckelberg, Petermann, Gell-Mann, Low
foundations.description: Scale-dependent evolution of coupling constants in quantum field theory.
